sentences.simplifiedText: 在公园里，我听到一个熟悉的声音在招呼我。
sentences.traditionalText: 在公園裡，我聽到一個熟悉的聲音在招呼我。
sentences.pinyin: Zài gōngyuán lǐ, wǒ tīngdào yīgè shúxī de shēngyīn zài zhāohū wǒ.
sentences.translation: In the park, I heard a familiar voice calling out to me.

sentences.simplifiedText: 当她亲切地向大家招呼，全场立刻变得热闹起来。
sentences.traditionalText: 當她親切地向大家招呼，全場立刻變得熱鬧起來。
sentences.pinyin: Dāng tā qīnqiè de xiàng dàjiā zhāohū, quánchǎng lìkè biàn de rènào qǐlái.
sentences.translation: When she warmly greeted everyone, the whole place instantly became lively.

sentences.pinyin: nǐ yào hǎo hǎo zhāo hū zì jǐ.
sentences.translation: You should take good care of yourself.

sentences.simplifiedText: 父母不在家，作为哥哥的你应该招呼好妹妹。
sentences.traditionalText: 父母不在家，作為哥哥的你應該招呼好妹妹。
sentences.pinyin: fù mǔ bú zài jiā, zuò wéi gē gē de nǐ yīng gāi zhāo hū hǎo mèi mèi.
sentences.translation: When your parents are not at home, you, as a brother, should take good care of your sister.
